title: We are unable to log you in because you may be offline
body:
I got the "We are unable to log you in because you may be offline" bullshit when i was connected to internet. Im not even able to enter username or password because the slots are blocking me from doing so, and none of the fixes i saw were helping
{{champion:19}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:3074}}

replies.body: Most of the login issues I've been seeing this morning cleared up after a couple hours, but let me know if you're still having those login problems and we can run a quick trace route using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to our NA servers at 192.64.170.1.
I don't have it anymore, I just re-installed it and I was able to log in..... now I just can't play because it still says I'm not connected to the internet

Same here in Euw. 
Playing on a macbook and since the patch came out i get the same message when i log in and can't do something about it.
